Description: The following statement contains a magic number: app.UseOAuthBearerTokens(new OAuthAuthorizationServerOptions              {                  TokenEndpointPath = new PathString("/token")'                  Provider = new ApplicationOAuthProvider(                      "self"' () => HttpContext.Current.GetOwinContext().GetUserManager<UserManager<User' int>>())'                  AuthorizeEndpointPath = new PathString("/api/account/authorize")'                  AccessTokenExpireTimeSpan = TimeSpan.FromDays(14)'                  AllowInsecureHttp = true              });
